exm.mng: don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
fig. not to shed a tear until one sees the coffin (idiom); lit. refuse to be convinced until one is faced with grim reality
exm.pyn: bù jiàn guān cái bù luò lèi

exm.mng: a bier, a catafalque (memorial platform), a coffin
